EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Frankfurt_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place on Thursday the 13th of April at the THE SQUAIRE Conference-Center. We look forward to seeing you soon.
Date:
Thursday, 13 April 2017 {{my.Save the Date Frankfurt:default=edit me}}
Time:
8.30am - 1.15pm Strategy Session 1.15pm - 5.15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
THE SQUAIRE Conference-Center The Squaire 12 Am Flughafen 60549 Frankfurt am Main (map <[[https://www.google.com/webhp?ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=The+Squaire+12+Am+Flughafen+60549+Frankfurt+am+Main&rflfq=1&rlha=0&rllag=50047303,8574539,766&tbm=lcl&tbs=lf_msr:-1,lf_pqs:EAE,lf:1,lf_ui:2]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/frankfurt?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
